document.h2:
DHCP Settings
This section is not available when the device is switched to bridged mode.
document.p: The DHCP Settings section on the Local Network page contains the following settings:
document.li1:
DHCP Server
Select the check box to enable the DHCP server.

Network address
The Network address used by the DHCP server. This is determined by the Local Device IP address and Local Network subnet under Global Information.

DHCP Start address
The first address that can be assigned by the DHCP server.

DHCP End address
The last address that can be assigned by the DHCP server.

New start
The value used for the last byte in the DHCP Start address.

New limit
The value used for the last byte in the DHCP End address.

Lease time
The time for which a DHCP client can use the IP address that was assigned by the DHCP server. Type the value followed by m (for minutes) or h (for hours).

DNS server
The DNS server to which DNS requests should be forwarded to.
